name: skbkontur-code-guides
description: SKBKontur Retail project javaScript code guides

scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:build && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m "update book" && git checkout -b gh-pages && git add . && git commit -am "update book" && git push git@github.com:skbkontur-retail/code-guides.git gh-pages --force

author: tihonove
